snippet: Connor McLaughlin, from Greenwich, N.Y., and his uncle were hiking near Roaring Brook Falls when a boulder fell on them, the authorities said.
abstract: Connor McLaughlin of Greenwich, NY, dies after being struck by bolder at base of Roaring Brook Falls in Adirondacks.
lead_paragraph: Connor McLaughlin, from Greenwich, N.Y., and his uncle were hiking near Roaring Brook Falls when a boulder fell on them, the authorities said.

headline.main: Falling Rock Kills Boy, 12, in the Adirondacks
headline.print_headline: Falling Boulder Kills Boy, 12, on a Hike in the Adirondacks
